name: metagrossite
effect: Held: Allows Metagross to Mega Evolve into Mega Metagross.
short_effect: Held: Allows Metagross to Mega Evolve into Mega Metagross.
flavor_text: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Metagross hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
